body:
I included Gaussian 16 to this recipe plus some improvements to patch Linda and use version in many places to make the recipe general enough for next versions.

List of changes:
- Find installer in current directory based on version
- Three new dictionaries to hold:
  - Linda files to patch based on version
  - String to replace in Linda files based on version
  - Location of Linda directory based on version
- Set environment variable `g<version>root` 
- Set environment variable `G<version>_BASIS`
- Set `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` based on where Linda is located for `version`

This has been installed & tested here in KAUST.
title: Improve gaussian recipe
